title: Frequently Asked Questions
ctaTitle: Didn't find what you were looking for?

items.question: What is Industry 4.0?
items.answer: Itâ€™s the digital transformation of industrial processes through technologies like IoT, AI, automation, and data analytics.

items.question: What services do you offer as a consultancy?
items.answer: We provide diagnostics, custom solution development, technology implementation, and training to help digitize your industry.

items.question: Do you work with small businesses or only large plants?
items.answer: We collaborate with companies of all sizes. Our solutions are scalable and adaptable to each context.

items.question: Can I request a demo or consultation with no commitment?
items.answer: Yes. You can schedule a meeting so we can understand your needs and show you how we can help.
